Title: Multiple vulnerabilities in libxml2, libxslt
Description: The vendored libxml2 and libxslt libraries have multiple vulnerabilities: CVE-2015-1819 CVE-2015-7941_1 CVE-2015-7941_2 CVE-2015-7942 CVE-2015-7942-2 CVE-2015-8035 CVE-2015-7995
AffectedVersions: All versions before 1.6.6.3, all versions starting from 1.6.7.rc2 before 1.6.7.rc4
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 1.6.6.3 before 1.6.7.rc2, all versions starting from 1.6.7.rc4
